name: Bullet Ball Bouncing Escape - Doge the Flying Enemies!
name_original: Bullet Ball Bouncing Escape - Doge the Flying Enemies!
description:
A classically addictive adventure! Bullet ball escape is a fun and challenging avoidance skill game. It's a great way to pass time and it's totally free!

Bounce and move to avoid the bullets!

> Use the arrows to control the ball
> Avoid the bullets
> Use the red bomb to bail you out (only once per game!)
> Get 1 pt for every bullet avoided
> ..and most importantly- BEAT your friends' scores

Suggestions? Email us at support@yololabs.com. We decided not to nag you with "rate me" popups so please do us a solid and rate Bullet Ball!
